Posts.Content: coryja wrote: On average- how long where you told to wait to resume physical activities (exercising/lifting) after a biopsy. I am having a stereotopic biopsy (with a core needle?) next week if that makes a difference. This was part of the information given to me over the phone- but I was a bit distracted and overwhelmed with everything that I cannot now remember. They will ofcourse go over this stuff with me the day of- but I am just trying to make some tentative plans. Thanks for any information that you provide! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stereotopic Biopsy- working out/exercise after? coryja KBeee
